verses.verse: Through <S%H8378>desire<s%> a man, having <S%H6504>separated<s%> himself, <S%H1245>seeks<s%> and <S%H1566>intermeddles<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8454>wisdom.<s%>
A <S%H3684>fool<s%> has <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H8394>understanding,<s%> but that his <S%H3820>heart<s%> may <S%H1540>discover<s%> itself.
When the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> then <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H937>contempt,<s%> and with <S%H7036>ignominy<s%> <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>

The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are as <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and the <S%H4726>wellspring<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> as a <S%H5042>flowing<s%> <S%H5158>brook.<s%>
It is not <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H5375>accept<s%> the <S%H6440>person<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> to <S%H5186>overthrow<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
A <S%H3684>fool's<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H7379>contention,<s%> and his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7121>calls<s%> for <S%H4112>strokes.<s%>
A <S%H3684>fool's<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is his <S%H4288>destruction,<s%> and his <S%H8193>lips<s%> are the <S%H4170>snare<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of a <S%H5372>talebearer<s%> are as <S%H3859>wounds,<s%> and they <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H2315>innermost<s%> parts of the <S%H990>belly.<s%>
He <S%H1571>also<s%> that is <S%H7503>slothful<s%> in his <S%H4399>work<s%> is <S%H251>brother<s%> to him that is a <S%H1167>great<s%> <S%H7843>waster.<s%>
The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4026>tower:<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H7323>runs<s%> into it, and is <S%H7682>safe.<s%>
The <S%H6223>rich<s%> man's <S%H1952>wealth<s%> is his <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H7151>city,<s%> and as an <S%H7682>high<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%> in his own <S%H4906>conceit.<s%>
<S%H6440>Before<s%> <S%H7667>destruction<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H1361>haughty,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3519>honor<s%> is <S%H6038>humility.<s%>
He that <S%H7725>answers<s%> a <S%H1697>matter<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> he <S%H8085>hears<s%> it, it is <S%H200>folly<s%> and <S%H3639>shame<s%> to him.
The <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> will <S%H3557>sustain<s%> his <S%H4245>infirmity;<s%> but a <S%H5218>wounded<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H5375>bear?<s%>
The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H995>prudent<s%> <S%H7069>gets<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge;<s%> and the <S%H241>ear<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>
A <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H4976>gift<s%> makes <S%H7337>room<s%> for him, and <S%H5148>brings<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> men.
He that is <S%H7223>first<s%> in his own <S%H7379>cause<s%> seems <S%H6662>just;<s%> but his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> and <S%H2713>searches<s%> him.
The <S%H1486>lot<s%> causes <S%H4079>contentions<s%> to <S%H7673>cease,<s%> and <S%H6504>parts<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H6099>mighty.<s%>

A <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6586>offended<s%> is harder to be won than a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H7151>city:<s%> and their <S%H4079>contentions<s%> are like the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of a <S%H759>castle.<s%>

A <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H990>belly<s%> shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> and with the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of his <S%H8193>lips<s%> shall he be <S%H7646>filled.<s%>
<S%H4194>Death<s%> and <S%H2416>life<s%> are in the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue:<s%> and they that <S%H157>love<s%> it shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof.
Whoever <S%H4672>finds<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H4672>finds<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> thing, and <S%H6329>obtains<s%> <S%H7522>favor<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
The <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H1696>uses<s%> <S%H8469>entreaties;<s%> but the <S%H6223>rich<s%> <S%H6030>answers<s%> <S%H5794>roughly.<s%>
A <S%H376>man<s%> that has <S%H7453>friends<s%> must show himself <S%H7489>friendly:<s%> and there is a <S%H157>friend<s%> that <S%H1695>sticks<s%> closer than a <S%H251>brother.<s%>
